name: Imperator, Penguin Swarm
description: The Imperator, a huge swarm of penguins, showcases a lively and overwhelming presence on icy terrain, utilizing its sheer numbers to intimidate foes.
memorable: Its ability to swarm and knock adversaries prone while gliding over ice makes it a unique challenge.
goals: To overwhelm adversaries with numbers and control the battlefield.
relations: May form swarms with other penguin types, typically encountered in cold environments.
environment: Frigid environments, particularly snowy or icy areas.
strengths: Resistant to various damage types and immune to many conditions, increasing its survivability.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class makes it vulnerable to precise attacks, especially from ranged attackers.
attacks: Uses its beaks for piercing damage in melee attacks, delivering significant blows when healthy.
most_powerful_ability: Toboggan Charge allows it to charge through opponents, dealing damage and possibly knocking them prone.
senses: Passive perception of 12 allows it to notice disturbances reasonably well.
skills: Has a perception skill of +2, indicating decent awareness of hidden threats.
additional_information: Swarm can occupy the same space as creatures.
Can glide over icy surfaces at double its walking speed.
Immunities include charm, fear, and paralysis.
Damage can vary based on its current hit points.
Can’t regain or gain temporary hit points while in swarm form.
test_queries: swarming creature that glides on ice
penguin swarm that knocks foes prone
dangerous icy beast with piercing beaks
creature that overwhelms with numbers on ice
